Title: concatWithSeparator
Description: Concatenates the given strings with a given separator.

sep — separator. Const String or FixedString.exprN — expression to be concatenated. Arguments which are not of types String or FixedString are converted to strings using their default serialization. As this decreases performance, it is not recommended to use non-String/FixedString arguments.
The String created by concatenating the arguments.
If any of the argument values is NULL, the function returns NULL.
